conbody.p: This article presents some strategies for locating Web elements on a webpage in different situations. These strategies reflect the user's mindset when perform UI Automation tests: First, think about simple static locators. Then when simple methods are no longer working, gradually increase the complexity of the solution.

It is important to mention that the following principle must be held in deciding locators: the locator must be unique, readable and maintainable. If the locator does not uniquely represent the target element, technical problems will arise during the maintenance phase as there is no way to know which locator should be changed.
